title: Preparation
description: Collect all necessary ingredients such as pasta, eggs, cheese, pancetta or bacon, and black pepper. Gather tools like a pot, pan, whisk, and grater. Ensure everything is within reach before starting.

original_subgoals.title: Preparation
original_subgoals.description: Collect all necessary ingredients such as pasta, eggs, cheese, pancetta or bacon, and black pepper. Gather tools like a pot, pan, whisk, and grater. Ensure everything is within reach before starting.

original_subgoals.title: Preparation
original_subgoals.description: Collect all necessary ingredients such as pasta, eggs, cheese, pancetta or bacon, and black pepper. Gather tools like a pot, pan, whisk, and grater. Ensure everything is within reach before starting.

title: Cooking Meat
description: In a pan, cook pancetta or bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside, leaving the rendered fat in the pan.

original_subgoals.title: Cooking Meat
original_subgoals.description: In a pan, cook pancetta or bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside, leaving the rendered fat in the pan.

original_subgoals.title: Cooking Meat
original_subgoals.description: In a pan, cook pancetta or bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside, leaving the rendered fat in the pan.

title: Cooking Pasta
description: Boil water in a pot and add a pinch of salt. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve some pasta water before draining.

original_subgoals.title: Cooking Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil water in a pot and add a pinch of salt. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve some pasta water before draining.

original_subgoals.title: Cooking Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil water in a pot and add a pinch of salt. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve some pasta water before draining.

title: Making Sauce
description: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated cheese until smooth. Season with black pepper. This mixture will form the sauce for the pasta.

original_subgoals.title: Making Sauce
original_subgoals.description: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated cheese until smooth. Season with black pepper. This mixture will form the sauce for the pasta.

original_subgoals.title: Making Sauce
original_subgoals.description: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated cheese until smooth. Season with black pepper. This mixture will form the sauce for the pasta.

title: Combining Ingredients
description: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the rendered fat. Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water if needed to adjust consistency.

original_subgoals.title: Combining Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the rendered fat. Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water if needed to adjust consistency.

original_subgoals.title: Combining Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the rendered fat. Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water if needed to adjust consistency.

title: Finishing Touches
description: Season with additional black pepper and sprinkle more cheese on top if desired. Serve immediately for best taste and texture.
